channel.title: Creating & Adding custom crowns to 508
channel.description:
Hey guys I've been looking around for awhile & can't seem to find a tutorial for 508 only alot of them for 317. Could anyone point me in the right direction?
Don't say use the search button or check google I have done that. :) thanks guys

item.title: Creating & Adding custom crowns to 508
item.dc:creator: @f_2_p_2_p_f f 2 p 2 p f
item.description:
@f_2_p_2_p_f wrote:

I realize I have to edit the cache that’s why I’m asking since I can’t seem to find a cache editor that supports 508s.
Someone must have created & released one by now, unless it’s possible to add it in using part of the 317 cache & c/p into the 508s?

Read full topic

item.title: Creating & Adding custom crowns to 508
item.dc:creator: @Syme Syme
item.description:
@Syme wrote:

Well, try to find a cache editor, but i never saw a 508 with custom crowns, most of em is on a 317.

Read full topic
